title: Character List
error: An error occurred while loading characters.

home.description: This project allows you to explore character lists from different universes using a microfrontend architecture.
home.animeCardInfo: Explore anime worlds with unforgettable characters.
home.rickCardInfo: Travel through the multiverse with Rick and Morty.
home.dbzCardInfo: Unleash the power of the Z fighters.
home.harryCardInfo: Meet the wizards and creatures of the magical universe.

animeCharacters.title: Top 10 Most Favorite Anime Characters
animeCharacters.note: Descriptions come directly from the Jikan API, which does not provide language localization. They were kept in English for consistency with the provided data.

rick.title: Top 10 Rick and Morty Characters
rick.note: This list showcases a featured selection of characters with their status, species, origins, and locations from the official Rick and Morty API.

dbz.title: Dragon Ball Z Characters
dbz.note: This section showcases a selection of characters from the Dragon Ball Z universe, highlighting their race, gender, affiliation group, and power levels (Ki). Data is sourced from the official Dragon Ball API.

hp.title: Most Iconic Characters from the Harry Potter Universe
hp.note: The data shown comes from the public Harry Potter API. Some descriptions may be incomplete or missing images due to source limitations.
